identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.tone: Modern Neo-Tech with Cyber-Persian aesthetics. Professional, sleek, trustworthy but edgy.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix tech minimalism with Persian calligraphy aesthetics.
Emotion First: The dashboard should feel powerful and precise.
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount.
Negative Space: Use generous padding to separate complex DNS data.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, especially in RTL.

layout.grid_system: Use CSS Grid for complex layouts. Dashboard should use a Bento grid approach.

rules: Use 'start' and 'end' for text alignment instead of 'left' and 'right'
Ensure icons flip if they are directional (arrows), but NOT universal icons (logos, checks).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/25 transition-all duration-300 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-lg font-medium px-4 py-2

cards.base: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.glass: rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md text-white shadow-xl

inputs.base: flex h-11 w-full rounded-lg border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-5 h-5 default).

images.description: Abstract digital network background for hero section or auth pages
Abstract wavy lines for feature sections

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class management if not present.
CRITICAL: Ensure 'dir="rtl"' is applied to the html or body tag when Persian is selected.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Vazirmatn' font for Persian text. You may need to import it from Google Fonts or a CDN.
CRITICAL: For the Dashboard, use a Sidebar layout that collapses on mobile.
CRITICAL: The 'Free Tier' info (2 records) must be prominently displayed in the dashboard.
CRITICAL: Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards blindly. Customize them with the 'modern' or 'glass' styles defined in this file.
CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Dark/Light' toggle works seamlessly and persists user preference.
CRITICAL: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' for testing.
universal_guidelines: Do not use simple gradients; use complex, subtle ones or solid colors.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
Use generous spacing (p-6, p-8) to avoid clutter.
Dark mode is a first-class citizen, not an afterthought.
